IMPORTANT: 
	- For all files you need to copy check the 3rdPartyTools folder to know which version you should use.
	- Check the READ ME for the modules you need to copy to see if there is any work to be done before copying them.

How To:
	- Unzip 3rdParty.7z
	- Copy from you PhysX Directory the following Files:
		- To PhysX\include folder from: <PhysX>/include
		- To PhysX\lib\Debug\x64 from: <PhysX>/Bin/vc12win64
			- PhysX3CharacterKinematicCHECKED_x64.lib
			- PhysX3CHECKED_x64.lib
			- PhysX3CommonCHECKED_x64.lib
			- PhysX3CookingCHECKED_x64.lib
			- PhysX3ExtensionsDEBUG.lib
			- physx3extensionsdebug.pdb
			- PhysXVisualDebuggerSDKDEBUG.lib
			- physxvisualdebuggersdkdebug.pdb			
		- To PhysX\lib\Debug\x86 from: <PhysX>/Bin/vc12win32
			- PhysX3CharacterKinematicCHECKED_x86.lib
			- PhysX3CHECKED_x86.lib
			- PhysX3CommonCHECKED_x86.lib
			- PhysX3CookingCHECKED_x86.lib
			- PhysX3ExtensionsDEBUG.lib
			- physx3extensionsdebug.pdb
			- PhysXVisualDebuggerSDKDEBUG.lib
			- physxvisualdebuggersdkdebug.pdb	
		- To PhysX\lib\Release\x64 from: <PhysX>/Bin/vc12win64
			- PhysX3_x64.lib
			- PhysX3CharacterKinematic_x64.lib
			- PhysX3Common_x64.lib
			- PhysX3Cooking_x64.lib
			- PhysX3Extensions.lib
			- physx3extensions.pdb
			- PhysXVisualDebuggerSDK.lib
			- physxvisualdebuggersdk.pdb
		- To PhysX\lib\Release\x86 from: <PhysX>/Bin/vc12win32
			- PhysX3_x86.lib
			- PhysX3CharacterKinematic_x86.lib
			- PhysX3Common_x86.lib
			- PhysX3Cooking_x86.lib
			- PhysX3Extensions.lib
			- physx3extensions.pdb
			- PhysXVisualDebuggerSDK.lib
			- physxvisualdebuggersdk.pdb
